+ /// ã“ã®ã‚¯ãƒ©ã‚¹ã¯ã€ã‚¢ãƒ—ãƒªã§ä½¿ç”¨ã•ã‚Œã‚‹ã™ã¹ã¦ã®è‰²ã¨ãƒ†ãƒ¼ãƒãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚’æä¾›ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚
+ class AppTheme {
+   /// ãƒ—ãƒ©ã‚¤ãƒãƒªã‚«ãƒ©ãƒ¼ï¼ˆæ¿ƒã„ç´«ï¼‰ã€‚
+   static const Color primary = Color(0xFF3C1A6C);
+ 
+   /// ã‚»ã‚«ãƒ³ãƒ€ãƒªã‚«ãƒ©ãƒ¼1ï¼ˆã‚¢ã‚¯ã‚»ãƒ³ãƒˆç´«ï¼‰ã€‚
+   static const Color secondary1 = Color(0xFF8B5CF6);
+ 
+   /// ã‚»ã‚«ãƒ³ãƒ€ãƒªã‚«ãƒ©ãƒ¼2ï¼ˆã‚¢ã‚¯ã‚»ãƒ³ãƒˆç´«ï¼‰ã€‚
+   static const Color secondary2 = Color(0xFF9B6ADF);
+ 
+   /// èƒŒæ™¯è‰²1ã€‚
+   static const Color background1 = Color(0xFFFCFBFF);
+ 
+   /// èƒŒæ™¯è‰²2ã€‚
+   static const Color background2 = Color(0xFFFBFAFE);
+ 
+   /// Surfaceã‚«ãƒ©ãƒ¼ã€‚
+   static const Color surface = Colors.white;
+ 
+   /// ãƒ†ã‚­ã‚¹ãƒˆã‚«ãƒ©ãƒ¼1ã€‚
+   static const Color text1 = Color(0xFF2F2F2F);
+ 
+   /// ãƒ†ã‚­ã‚¹ãƒˆã‚«ãƒ©ãƒ¼2ã€‚
+   static const Color text2 = Color(0xFF645E6D);
+ 
+   /// ã‚·ãƒ£ãƒ‰ã‚¦ã‚«ãƒ©ãƒ¼ã€‚
+   static const Color shadow = Color(0xFFECECEC);
+ 
+   /// ãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ãƒ¼ã‚¢ãƒã‚¿ãƒ¼ã®èƒŒæ™¯è‰²ã€‚
+   static const Color userAvatar = Color(0xFFD9D9D9);
+ 
+   /// ã‚¢ãƒ—ãƒªã‚±ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ã®ã‚«ãƒ©ãƒ¼ãƒ†ãƒ¼ãƒã‚’å®šç¾©ã™ã‚‹ [ColorScheme] ã‚’å–å¾—ã™ã‚‹ã€‚
+   ///
+   /// ã“ã®ã‚¹ã‚­ãƒ¼ãƒ ã¯ã€ã‚¢ãƒ—ãƒªå…¨ä½“ã§ä½¿ç”¨ã•ã‚Œã‚‹ä¸»è¦ãªè‰²ã®ã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆã‚’æä¾›ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚
+   static ColorScheme get lightColorScheme {
+     return const ColorScheme(
+       brightness: Brightness.light,
+       primary: primary,
+       onPrimary: Colors.white,
+       secondary: secondary1,
+       onSecondary: Colors.white,
+       error: Colors.red,
+       onError: Colors.white,
+       background: background1,
+       onBackground: text1,
+       surface: surface,
+       onSurface: text1,
+     );
+   }
+ 
+   /// ã‚¢ãƒ—ãƒªã‚±ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ã®ãƒ†ãƒ¼ãƒãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚’å–å¾—ã™ã‚‹ã€‚
+   ///
+   /// ã“ã®ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã¯ã€[MaterialApp] ã® [ThemeData] ã¨ã—ã¦ä½¿ç”¨ã•ã‚Œã¾ã™ã€‚
+   static ThemeData get lightTheme {
+     return ThemeData(
+       useMaterial3: true,
+       colorScheme: lightColorScheme,
+       scaffoldBackgroundColor: background1,
+       appBarTheme: const AppBarTheme(
+         backgroundColor: primary,
+         foregroundColor: Colors.white,
+       ),
+       elevatedButtonTheme: ElevatedButtonThemeData(
+         style: ElevatedButton.styleFrom(
+           backgroundColor: primary,
+           foregroundColor: Colors.white,
+         ),
+       ),
+       textButtonTheme: TextButtonThemeData(
+         style: TextButton.styleFrom(
+           foregroundColor: primary,
+         ),
+       ),
+       inputDecorationTheme: const InputDecorationTheme(
+         border: OutlineInputBorder(),
+         focusedBorder: OutlineInputBorder(
+           borderSide: BorderSide(color: primary),
+         ),
+       ),
+     );
+   }
+ }
